problem.markdown:
>>30:60s and 60:120s allow Soldiers to be able to sustain performance of physically demanding tasks at a<< ( ) greater resistance to fatigue over a shorter duration ( ) lower intensity for a shorter duration (x) higher intensity for a longer duration
[explanation] higher intensity for a longer duration [explanation]
problem.p: 30:60s and 60:120s allow Soldiers to be able to sustain performance of physically demanding tasks at a

choicegroup.label: 30:60s and 60:120s allow Soldiers to be able to sustain performance of physically demanding tasks at a

lower intensity for a shorter duration
higher intensity for a longer duration

div.p: higher intensity for a longer duration
